name: Staff of Obstacles
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Staves/Staff of Obstacles

Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, arcane lock, grease, wall of fire, wall of ice, wall of stone, wind wall

sections.body:
Dark and solid, this worn staff looks to be carved of rough stone, yet feels and weighs like light wood. It allows use of the following spells:

  • arcane lock (1 charge)
  • grease (1 charge)
  • wind wall (1 charge)
  • wall of fire (2 charges)
  • wall of ice (2 charges)
  • wall of stone (3 charges)
sections.name: Description
